definition: to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom)/to bring about one's own destruction

sentences.english: I don't want to dice with death by pissing off this guy.
sentences.chinese: 我可不想招惹這哥們兒，自尋死路。

sentences.english: Our receipt of the proposal was a bombshell .
sentences.chinese: 我們如接受其建議，無疑是自尋死路。

sentences.english: “Either my father or my mother would die,” he says.
sentences.chinese: “我的父親或是母親會去尋死”，他說。

sentences.english: Those people who want to die are suffering.
sentences.chinese: 那些尋死的人飽受折磨。

sentences.english: Not only is it social suicide, it's mean.
sentences.chinese: 這不止是在社交上自尋死路，還很卑鄙。

sentences.english: It is for an idea, a thought, that he is getting ready for death.
sentences.chinese: 正是爲了一種想法，一種思想，基裏洛夫決意尋死。

definition: cannot figure out/to be unable to take a lighter view/to take things too hard/to be depressed/to fret over trifles
to make a long story short (idiom)
to submit to humiliation (idiom); to suffer in silence/to swallow one's anger/to grin and bear it
lit. to rein in the horse at the edge of the precipice (idiom)/fig. to act in the nick of time
to escape (danger)/to rescue/to come out alive
to sound out the difficulties and retreat to avoid defeat (idiom); fig. to back out of an awkward situation/to get out on finding out what it's really like
every hope turns to dust (idiom); completely disheartened
